header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: ideas for a small online business, social media technologies, higher education and university students, friendsâ€™ involvement in the business.
header.activity: A couple discussing ideas to set up a small online business.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, inviting, anecdote telling, making arrangements
